org.gearvrf.script

Class GVRScriptBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRComponent
        • org.gearvrf.GVRBehavior
          • org.gearvrf.script.GVRScriptBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GVRDrawFrameListener, IEvents, IPickEvents, ISceneEvents, ISensorEvents

    public class GVRScriptBehavior
extends GVRBehavior
implements IPickEvents, ISensorEvents, ISceneEvents
    Attaches a Java or Lua script to a scene object. These script callbacks are invoked if they are present: onEarlyInit(GVRContext) called after script is loaded onAfterInit() called when the script becomes active (this component is attached to a scene object and enabled) onStep() called every frame if this component is enabled and attached to a scene object onPickEnter(GVRSceneObject, GVRPicker.GVRPickedObject) called when picking ray enters an object onPickExit(GVRSceneObject) called when picking ray exits an object onPickInside(GVRSceneObject, GVRPicker.GVRPickedObject) called when picking ray is inside an object onPick(GVRPicker) called when picking selection changes onNoPick(GVRPicker) called when nothing is picked

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject

      • setScriptFile

        public void setScriptFile(GVRScriptFile scriptFile)
        Set the GVRScriptFile to execute.
        Parameters:
        scriptFile - GVRScriptFile with script already loaded. If the script contains a function called "onEarlyInit" it is called if the script file is valid.

      • onDetach

        public void onDetach(GVRSceneObject owner)
        Description copied from class: GVRBehavior
        Called when this behavior is detached from a scene object. Detaching a behavior from a scene object will cause it to stop listening to scene events (onStep won't be called).
        Overrides:
        onDetach in class GVRBehavior
        Parameters:
        owner - GVRSceneObject the behavior was detached from.

      • invokeFunction

        public boolean invokeFunction(java.lang.String funcName,
                              java.lang.Object[] args)
        Calls a function script associated with this component. The function is called even if the component is not enabled and not attached to a scene object.
        Parameters:
        funcName - name of script function to call.
        args - function parameters as an array of objects.
        Returns:
        true if function was called, false if no such function
        See Also:
        invokeFunction
